publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3268 Murdo Fraser: Scottish Traditional Danceâ€”That the Parliament recognises the importance of traditional Scottish dance and its contribution to Scottish culture; commends the work of the Scottish Traditions of Dance Trust in representing the interests of all Scottish traditions of dance, Ceilidh, Country, Early, Hebridean, Highland, Military, Old Time, Orkney, Shetland and Step, and in promoting traditional dance, particularly within schools, and calls on the Scottish Executive to encourage schools to make traditional dance available as part of the physical education curriculum. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Phil Gallie*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Cathy Peattie*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Keith Harding*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Christine Grahame*, Brian Adam*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3268 Scottish Traditional Dance (lodged on 27 June 2002) Scott Barrie*
